wikipedia_page.main: Arthur Stopford Francis (14 June 1854 – January 1908) was an English first-class cricketer active 1880–87 who played for Middlesex. He was born in Upminster; it is not known where he died.

response: * Arthur Francis, a pseudonym used by Ira Gershwin (1896–1983), American lyricist
* Arthur Francis (rugby) (1882–1957), New Zealand dual-code rugby player
* Arthur Francis (Glamorgan cricketer) (born 1953), former Welsh cricketer
* Arthur Francis (politician) (1828–1902), member of the Queensland Legislative Assembly
